name: Snake Off
description:
"Snake Off - Addicting Gameplay!
Snake Off is an upgrade of the classic snake game we played as kids! Brand new gameplay is waiting for you!
This super fun casual game requires speed and strategy! In Snake Off, players start off with a short snake. Play well to grow the snake and achieve domination!

Gameplay
1. Use the joystick to move your snake and grow longer by eating the colorful dots on the map.
2. Be careful! When the head of your snake touches another snake, it will die and leave behind dots.
3. Hold the speed-up button for better positioning to make other players run into your snake. Eat their corpses to grow longer!
4. Compete for the longest snake with your friends in Endless Mode or Time Mode!

Game features
[Advantage for Shorter Snakes Can Quickly Turn the Tides] The length of your snake gives you different possibilities! Long snakes have a positional advantage, but smaller snakes are easier to control! Turn the tides of battle in an instant!
[Easy and Fun, Suitable for All Ages] Regardless of age, gender, or career, anyone can enjoy the simple controls of Snake Off!
[Battle Tips from a Pro] High speed passing, sudden stops, elegant 180 degree turns, circle entrapments: all of these techniques are available! Strategy is just as important and speed, but of course it's best to have both!
[Infectious and Addicting] The super cute art style will have you playing one game after another! Once you start, you just can't stop!

If you like Snake Off, please recommend it to your friends! Suggestions and feedback are always welcomed!"
